FILE: cm368411v11.0.txt
DYAD: LITHUANIA - EQUATORIAL GUINEA
RIVALRY: RIV1026
DISPUTE(S): MID4214 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180912
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180912

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID4214 

TERRMID: MID4214 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4214 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4214 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4214 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4214 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4214 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: MID4214 from cm narrative, Equatorial Guinea seized Lithuanian fishing boat in international waters. Lithuania sent protest notes demanding its immediate release. Equatorial Guinea later charged the ship with illegal fishing; Lithuania protested again, claiming no fishing equipment was on board. Coded not maritime because this was not connected to a maritime dispute. 

ISLMID: MID4214 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4214 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4214 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4214 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID4214 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4214 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4214 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4214 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4214 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4214 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID3 1993-2001:

MID4214
rivalry=368411 nationa=EQUATORIAL GUINEA nationb=LITHUANIA MID4214 20001110-20001220 
 revtype1a=POLICY revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=USE OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0
lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

Equatorial Guinea seized Lithuanian fishing boat in international waters. Lithuania sent protest notes demanding its immediate release. Equatorial Guinea later charged the ship with illegal fishing; Lithuania protested again, claiming no fishing equipment was on board. First day of dispute was on 11/10/2000 and last day of dispute was on 12/20/2000.

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:
